articles.content: "The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) and BYJU have decided to extend the agreement over jersey sponsorship of the Indian team. The extension with the Bangalore-based multinational educat… [+2323 chars]

articles.title: Ranji Trophy 2022: Seven Teams Including Bengal, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh, Mumbai Qualify For Quarters Directly - Cricket Addictor
articles.description: Ranji Trophy 2022: Mumbai, Bengal, Uttar Pradesh, 4 Others Directly Qualify for Quarter-Finals
articles.content: Seven Elite group table-toppers have qualified for the quarter-finals in Ranji Trophy 2022. Mumbai, Karnataka, Punjab, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, Bengal, and Uttarakhand are the 7 teams who have … [+2582 chars]
